ygData.messageBody:
Maybe, but I do this several times per gaming session, in a pretty remote
part of EverFrost. Ice bones are resistant to non-magical attacks, and since
my 'tank' friend doesn't have a magical weapon, we pretty much always have
to flee from these foul creatures while we're hunting orcs...

Not worth arguing over, because I won't dispute that most critters never
give up.



> What you probably did was hit an area it couldn't cross or they had
> their attention broken by another character or were killed. No
> monster ever
> forgets you unless they die, you die, you zone, or some Enchanter hits it
> with a MEmory Blur (actually I think that only makes the monster
> forget who
> he's pissed off the most at). Chances are something happened to
> to icebone
> while you were hauling arse.
>
> Malark on Karana
